titles.title: REMOVE Act

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to minimize costs and burdens under the Medicare program by providing for consideration of the removal of certain measures applicable to inpatient hospitals and post-acute care inpatient providers and providing for meaningful measures.
REMOVE Act

bill.summary:
Remove Extraneous Measures that Obstruct Value and Efficiency Act or the REMOVE Act
This bill specifies factors that the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services must consider when (1) removing a quality measure from certain Medicare payment systems, or (2) selecting or updating quality measures to use under Medicare.
